org.jbei.ice.services.rest

Class FolderResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.services.rest.RestResource
      • org.jbei.ice.services.rest.FolderResource

  • @Path(value="/folders")
public class FolderResource
extends RestResource
    Rest resource for dealing with folders. Note that this is different from collections whose api can be found in the CollectionResource class.
    Folders are generally contained in collections and can be created and deleted in an ad-hoc manner while collections are a system defined fixed set.
    Author:
    Hector Plahar

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAutoCompleteForAvailableFolders(@QueryParam(value="val")

      • getFolders

        @GET
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFolders()

      • create

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response create(@DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="isTransfer")
                                                                                   boolean isTransfer,
                                                                                   FolderDetails folder)
        Creates a new folder with the details specified in the parameter. The folder is either created by a user or represents one that is transferred

        The default type for the folder is PRIVATE and is owned by the user creating it unless it is transferred

        Parameters:
        isTransfer - whether the folder being created is a transfer folder or not
        folder - details of the folder to create
        Returns:
        information about the created folder including the unique identifier

 @Path(value="/public")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getPublicFolders()

      • getFolder

        @GET
 @Path(value="{id}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFolder(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                          long folderId)
        Retrieve specified folder resource
        Parameters:
        folderId - unique folder resource identifier
        Returns:
        folder specified by resource id, if the user making request has appropriate privileges

 @Path(value="/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response update(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                   long folderId,
                                                                   FolderDetails details)
        Updates the specified folder resource
        Parameters:
        folderId - resource identifier of folder to be updated

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addSelectedEntriesToFolders(EntrySelection entrySelection,
                                                                                                                                                                     @QueryParam(value="token")
                                                                                                                                                                     String remoteUserToken,
                                                                                                                                                                     @QueryParam(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                     String remoteUserId,
                                                                                                                                                                     @QueryParam(value="folderId")

      • modifyFolderEntries

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/{id}/entries")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response modifyFolderEntries(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                   long folderId,
                                                                                                                                                                   @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="move")
                                                                                                                                                                   boolean move,
                                                                                                                                                                   EntrySelection entrySelection)
        Modifies the contents of a folder either by removing or moving entries as determined by the move parameter
        Parameters:
        folderId - resource identifier for folder whose contents are to be modified
        move - whether to move the specified entries or simply remove them from the folder
        entrySelection - wrapper around context for modification

      • read

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/{id}/entries")
public FolderDetails read(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                  String folderId,
                                                                                                  @DefaultValue(value="0") @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                  int offset,
                                                                                                  @DefaultValue(value="15") @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                  int limit,
                                                                                                  @DefaultValue(value="created") @QueryParam(value="sort")
                                                                                                  String sort,
                                                                                                  @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="asc")
                                                                                                  boolean asc,
                                                                                                  @DefaultValue(value="") @QueryParam(value="filter")
                                                                                                  String filter,
                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="token")
                                                                                                  String token,
                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="userId")
                                                                                                  String remoteUserId,
                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="fields")
                                                                                                  List<String> queryParam)
        Retrieves the entries for specified folder. Handles request from a local client (ui) or from a remote ice instance
        Returns:
        list of retrieved entries wrapped in folder object

      • getFolderPermissions

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/{id}/permissions")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFolderPermissions(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                  long folderId)
        Retrieves list of permissions available for the specified folder. This action is restricted to users who have write privileges on the folder
        Parameters:
        folderId - unique local folder identifier
        Returns:
        list of permissions for folder

      • addPermission

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/{id}/permissions")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addPermission(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                            long folderId,
                                                                                                                            AccessPermission permission)
        Add new permission to list of permissions for specified folder
        Parameters:
        folderId - unique local folder identifier
        permission - details about access privilege for folder
        Returns:
        details about access privilege for folder with a local unique identifier which can be used to remove the privilege
